message: Let's divide fairly, I'll take a bit more
My turn! How about a slightly better deal for me this time?  Things only get worse as we wait...
Come on, let's meet in the middle, time is money!
Okay, how about this? I'm taking a small step back, but we need to settle this soon.  We both lose if this drags on.
I'm willing to compromise, but I won't go below this
This is getting ridiculous, Alice.  I'm taking another small hit, but this is getting ridiculous. Take the deal before we both lose!
